/* ç»Ÿè®¡æ¨¡å—ç¾åŒ– */
/* Total count statistics style */
.totalcount {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: var(--section-separation);
  background-color: var(--card-background);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-l1);
  border-radius: var(--card-border-radius);
  padding: var(--card-padding);
  transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease;

  &:hover {
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-l2);
  }

  .count-box {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 12px;
      font-family: var(--article-font-family);
      color: var(--card-text-color-main);
      
      // ä¸»ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°å­—
      strong {
          font-size: 2.8rem;
          font-weight: 600;
          color: var(--accent-color);
          
          @include respond(md) {
              font-size: 3.2rem;
          }
      }

      // æè¿°æ–‡å­—
      span {
          font-size: 1.6rem;
          color: var(--card-text-color-secondary);
          line-height: 1.5;

          @include respond(md) {
              font-size: 1.8rem;
          }
      }

      // è¾…åŠ©ä¿¡æ¯
      .meta {
          display: flex;
          gap: 20px;
          margin-top: 15px;
          font-size: 1.4rem;
          color: var(--card-text-color-tertiary);

          div {
              display: flex;
              align-items: center;
              gap: 8px;

              svg {
                  width: 18px;
                  height: 18px;
                  stroke: currentColor;
              }
          }
      }
  }

  // å“åº”å¼è°ƒæ•´
  @include respond(xl) {
      padding: calc(var(--card-padding) * 1.2);
      
      .count-box {
          gap: 15px;
      }
  }

  // ç´§å‡‘æ¨¡å¼å˜ä½“
  &--compact {
      padding: var(--small-card-padding);
      .count-box {
          flex-direction: row;
          align-items: baseline;
          gap: 20px;

          strong {
              font-size: 2.2rem;
          }

          span {
              font-size: 1.4rem;
          }
      }
  }
}
